item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: Markdown Syntax Italics _ Bold ** Header # Link other web sites Inline links [text](web site address) example: Go to xi’s blog reference links here is a [line][here] [here]: https://www.algoxi.com Here is a Link. Images Inline image link
